scripts.stack:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d db jaeger
scripts.db:psql: docker compose exec db psql -U postgres -d casino
scripts.db:ping: docker compose exec db pg_isready -U postgres -d casino
scripts.db:reset: docker compose exec -u postgres db psql -U postgres -d postgres -c "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS casino; CREATE DATABASE casino;" && yarn prisma:deploy
scripts.prisma:gen: docker compose run --rm toolbox bash -lc "yarn prisma generate --schema=libs/db/schema.prisma"
scripts.prisma:dev: docker compose run --rm toolbox bash -lc "yarn prisma migrate dev --schema=libs/db/schema.prisma"
scripts.prisma:deploy: docker compose run --rm toolbox bash -lc "yarn prisma migrate deploy --schema=libs/db/schema.prisma"
scripts.prisma:studio: docker compose run --rm --service-ports toolbox bash -lc "yarn prisma studio --schema=libs/db/schema.prisma --browser none"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n client,admin,workers,backoffice -c blue,green,magenta "yarn dev:client" "yarn dev:admin" "yarn dev:workers" "yarn dev:backoffice"
scripts.up: yarn stack:up && yarn prisma:gen && yarn prisma:deploy && yarn dev:all
scripts.push:client-api: docker build --platform linux/amd64 -t us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/dota-dd5dd/casino/client-api:latest --build-arg APP=client-api . && docker push us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/dota-dd5dd/casino/client-api:latest && gcloud beta run deploy client-api --image us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/dota-dd5dd/casino/client-api:latest --region us-central1 --project dota-dd5dd --vpc-egress=private-ranges-only --network=default --subnet=default
scripts.push:admin-api: docker build --platform linux/amd64 -t us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/dota-dd5dd/casino/admin-api:latest --build-arg APP=admin-api . && docker push us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/dota-dd5dd/casino/admin-api:latest && gcloud beta run deploy admin-api --image us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/dota-dd5dd/casino/admin-api:latest --region us-central1 --project dota-dd5dd --vpc-egress=private-ranges-only --network=default --subnet=default
scripts.push:backoffice-api: docker build --platform linux/amd64 -t us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/dota-dd5dd/casino/backoffice-api:latest --build-arg APP=backoffice-api . && docker push us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/dota-dd5dd/casino/backoffice-api:latest && gcloud beta run deploy backoffice-api --image us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/dota-dd5dd/casino/backoffice-api:latest --region us-central1 --project dota-dd5dd --vpc-egress=private-ranges-only --network=default --subnet=default
scripts.build:all: yarn clean && yarn prisma:gen:local && yarn build:client && yarn build:admin && yarn build:backoffice
